Comment: A unique ID number for the budget line record.
The ID number of the budget that the line record belongs to.
Last year actuals for the budget line.
The ID number of the Account Group that the line applies to (if there is one).
The ID number of the Alternate Account Group that the line applies to (if there is one).
The ID number of the Debtor account that the line applies to (if there is one).
The ID number of the Stock Group that the line applies to (if there is one).
The ID number of the Alternate Stock Group that the line applies to (if there is one).
The ID number of the Stock item that the line applies to (if there is one).
The ID number of the branch that the line applies to (if there is one).
The ID number of the staff member that the line applies to (if there is one).
